name: Customize WP-admin
author: Arteck

sections.description: With Customize WP-admin you can customize your WP Admin. Easily remove any menu or submenu from the admin sidebar. You can also change the footer at wp-admin, the image and link of WordPress on wp-login, and remoce the WP admin top bar from the frontend. Customizing this way your WordPress experience.
sections.installation:
This plugin should install as any other WordPress.org respository plugin.

  1. Browse to Plugins -> Add Plugin
  2. Search: Customize WP-admin
  3. Click Install
  4. Click to Activate.

Alternatively using FTP:

  1. Download the zip file using the download link to the right.
  2. Extract the contents of the file and locate the folder called ‘customize-wp-admin’ containing the plugin files.
  3. Upload this whole folder to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  4. From the plugins page within WordPress locate the plugin ‘Customize WP-admin’ and click Activate

A new menu item will appear on the left-hand side called ‘CWA Settings’. Click this menu and start customizing WordPress at your needs.

0.2.1

  • Fixed The plugin generated xxx characters of unexpected output during activation.

0.2

  • Fixed Bugs
  • Added option to show plugin on sidebar or inside Settings
  • Added Full Spanish Localization
  • Fixed Remove Dashboard Widgets not removing
  • Temparily removed the option to remove wp admin bar in wp-admin
  • Added ability to remove side widgets (dashboard)

0.1

  • First Public Release
  • Let’s you remove any menu or submenu from wp-admin
  • Change footer at wp-admin
  • Change Image and Link from wp-login
  • Remove admin-bar from backend and frontend
  • Localization ready
